WRITING.TEXT: Or 100 000 words less than Crime and Punishment.

WRITING.TITLE: What are the most influential books in human history? Fiction and Nonfiction.
WRITING.TEXT:
Need perspective for a writing project. Any input is appreciated. Preferably books which structured our current society. Contemporary works would also be useful.
Edit 1:Thanks for all the responses. A lot of books I didn't consider.

WRITING.TITLE: [S5][E7] Regarding the scene with Gilly and Sam.
Regarding Sam and Gillies savior. (Spoilers Aired)

WRITING.TEXT: Its nice and truthful. It doesn't really leave too much of an impression though. I think if you wanted you could expand the concept, but its fine how it is. I like the tone, its almost written in the way of someone trying to hold back tears. It reminds me of something you would find on a napkin in bar.
